Column2: 嘿，橄球比賽就在今天！

Column1: This might be my favorite day of the week.
Column2: 這可能是一週裡面我最喜歡的一天。

Column1: You came all the way through the snow to see me?
Column2: 你居然冒著風雪專程來看我？

Column1: That's nice of you.
Column2: 你這人實在是太好了。

Column1: I guess it's interesting that some people are totally different than us, you know?
Column2: 有些與我們截然不同的人存在，這不是挺好玩的嗎？

Column1: I don't always understand why others act the way they do, but that's fine.
Column2: 我搞不懂他們為什麼會那樣，但我並不介意。

Column1: Hey, @. Could you do me a favor?
Column2: 嘿，@。你能幫我個忙嗎？

Column1: If you see Haley, tell her I'm busy.
Column2: 要是你見到了海莉，告訴她我在忙。

Column1: Thanks.
Column2: 謝謝你。

Column1: I'll admit... I was a little jealous when you and Haley got married. But, hey... It's a chance for me to learn something new about myself.
Column2: 我承認……你和海莉結婚的時候我有點嫉妒。但是，哎……這也是一個我重新瞭解自己的機會。

Column1: You know what? I'm going to start reading a book!
Column2: 你知道嗎？我要開始讀書了！

Column1: I wish I could control the weather.
Column2: 真希望我能控制天氣。

Column1: If I ever make a lot of money, I'll make sure all my friends and family are taken care of.
Column2: 要是我能賺到大錢，一定會讓我的親朋好友過上好日子。

Column1: That means you, too.
Column2: 也包括你在內。
